subs.text: March 13
@KimInAltstadt Don‚Äôt worry about us. We‚Äôre still making a living. Reacting to change in a timely manner is how we don‚Äôt let change get the best of us.
subs.rawText: @KimInAltstadt Don‚Äôt worry about us. We‚Äôre still making a living. Reacting to change in a timely manner is how we don‚Äôt let change get the best of us.

subs.text: We‚Äôre amending our business plan to account for the war in Ukraine. We‚Äôve already seen moderate to drastic effects on sales, especially in locations more dependent on car traffic. (1/3)
subs.rawText: We‚Äôre amending our business plan to account for the war in Ukraine. We‚Äôve already seen moderate to drastic effects on sales, especially in locations more dependent on car traffic. (1/3)

subs.text: We expect those sales decreases to continue for a couple months, then ebb off by summer as people get used to higher gas prices. Meanwhile our food and energy costs have increased, in some cases dramatically. (2/3)
subs.rawText: We expect those sales decreases to continue for a couple months, then ebb off by summer as people get used to higher gas prices. Meanwhile our food and energy costs have increased, in some cases dramatically. (2/3)

subs.text: We had been expecting a 'normal' non-pandemic year in 2022 but we now we expect flat sales and higher costs for the year.  In other words, recession. (3/3)
subs.rawText: We had been expecting a 'normal' non-pandemic year in 2022 but we now we expect flat sales and higher costs for the year.  In other words, recession. (3/3)

subs.text: For International Women‚Äôs Day I calculated the Gender Pay Gap for our company. In Management our pay gap is -4.10%, i.e. men earn 4.10% less per hour than women. (If we include our male supervisor, it looks better for men, +2,93%.) In head count women outnumber men by 2 to 1.
subs.rawText: For International Women‚Äôs Day I calculated the Gender Pay Gap for our company. In Management our pay gap is -4.10%, i.e. men earn 4.10% less per hour than women. (If we include our male supervisor, it looks better for men, +2,93%.) In head count women outnumber men by 2 to 1.

subs.text: March 6

@davewiner A couple months ago we hooked up photovoltaic panels, and as a free benefit got an app to keep track of our power usage in real time and over time. We also have a metered wallbox to charge our 2 electric vehicles. For the first time we can keep a good eye on things.
subs.rawText: @davewiner A couple months ago we hooked up photovoltaic panels, and as a free benefit got an app to keep track of our power usage in real time and over time. We also have a metered wallbox to charge our 2 electric vehicles. For the first time we can keep a good eye on things.
